Texts.Chs: 如果一个被猎杀的人真心希望成为猎人，他必须把这三个物品放在一个祭坛上，并祈求毁灭他的敌人。放置的物品是：一个远古神器，一本远古之书和五块刀剑碎片。一定要正确地念祷词，否则被摧毁的将会是你。
Texts.Eng: If the hunted truly wishes to becomes the hunter he must place these three objects upon an alter an offer a prayer for destruction of his enemies. 1 Elder Artifact, 1 Elder Tome and 5 Blade Shards. Be sure to utter the prayer correctly or it will be you who shall be destroyed.

Texts.Chs: 一把奇怪的弓的示意图。
